p: Despite the large body of evidence summarized above, there are open questions that still challenge the idea that isoprene might have a definite role in plant protection. Why did only about 20% of the plants worldwide develop the capacity to emit isoprene? ( Loreto and Fineschi, 2015). Why are these plants spread all over biomes and climatic areas ( Loreto and Fineschi, 2015), and are not concentrated where stress protection becomes more relevant for securing plant survival, growth, and reproduction?
